lead_paragraph: A $1 million bonus is being offered to any horse that sweeps this year’s Pacific Classic, Awesome Again Stakes and Breeders’ Cup Classic, three Grade 1 Southern California races.

headline.main: $1 Million Bonus Is Offered for Horse Race Sweep

snippet: A $1 million bonus is being offered to any horse that sweeps this year’s Pacific Classic, Awesome Again Stakes and Breeders’ Cup Classic, three Grade 1 Southern California races.
abstract: Bonus of $1 million is being offered to any horse making unprecedented sweep of all three Pacific Classic races in 2016.
